short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Silver helps you save money on health expenses by collecting receipts and submitting them to your FSA or HSA Provider.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Silver helps you find past purchases that are eligible for reimbursement from your Flexible Spending Account (FSA) or Health Savings Account (HSA). The extension will automatically collect your receipts from retailers, including Costco, Amazon, Target, Walmart, and Walgreens. It will identify any eligible items and automate the claim process. 

*Key features:*

Automatic Receipt Import: Silver smartly imports your eligible receipts from top retailers and is continually adding more.

Secure Receipt Storage: All your receipts are safely stored in Silver. Return to review last years eligible amount to help you plan for your next FSA contribution. 

Eligibility Check: Silver identifies eligible purchases so you don't have to, allowing you to take full advantage of the FSA/HSA benefit. 

Auto-submit to FSA/HSA: After identifying eligible items, Silver will walk you through adding your account details and then submit all required paperwork on your behalf.  

Privacy-First Approach: Silver prioritizes your privacy. Your receipt data is securely stored and we do not share or sell your data to any third parties.

User-Friendly: Just visit the site and walk through the collection process. Silver will transition you from website to extension when needed.
